---
title: "Quarto-header-icon Example"
filters:
  - quarto-header-icon

header_icon:
  custom_icons:
    - "my.json"
---

## Heading {ico="jam:header-2"}

This filter adds the associated Iconify icon preceding the heading text.

```default
## Heading {ico="jam:header-2"}
```

## Custom icons {ico="my:docstring"}

This should be a custom icon from the `my.json` icon set in this directory. Probably too fragile for general use; more testing required.
